name: aliens ate my boyfriend (playdate)
description:
road trip across the country while fighting off starvation, engine failure and alien abduction 👽

how to play:

1. use the crank to drive

2. enter buildings to search for food

3. starve to death

---

warning: this game was waaay too big a side project for me, it 1000% has many many many bugs I have yet to find

special thanks to ericlewis, vogelscript, Kilij Arslan, ledbetter, NickSr, newkid, PomPomsforLlamLlams, Koshepen and others (project spanned 3 months so I am prob forgetting people- lmk) for all the help & assistance
